__e: We were engaged for over a year and she never mentioned a boyfriend.
You've been on and off with this woman for seven years and engaged for one year.

Considering that we have been engaged since February the 22nd, and that I only met you today for the first time, I think it is rather hard that you should leave me... for so long a period as half an hour.
I left him a message this morning, and I told him that we were engaged, and he hasn't called me back all day.
So, back in 2005, when I was 27, my two best friends got engaged, and it got me thinking, maybe I should get married.
When I got hurt, we were engaged, and I gave her an out.
